resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-search
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube search
resourceTemplates.description: Search YouTube for videos, channels, and playlists with advanced filters.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-video
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube video
resourceTemplates.description: Get metadata for a YouTube video (deprecated by Supadata).

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-transcript
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube transcript
resourceTemplates.description: Get transcript from a YouTube video. If lang is missing/unavailable, defaults to first available language.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-channel
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube channel
resourceTemplates.description: Get metadata for a YouTube channel.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-playlist
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube playlist
resourceTemplates.description: Get metadata for a YouTube playlist.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-channel-videos
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube channel videos
resourceTemplates.description: Get video IDs from a YouTube channel.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-playlist-videos
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube playlist videos
resourceTemplates.description: Get video IDs from a YouTube playlist.

resourceTemplates.name: supadata-youtube-batch
resourceTemplates.title: Supadata YouTube batch results
resourceTemplates.description: Get the status and results of a YouTube batch job.
